repast.simphony.batch.ssh

Class MatchedFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • repast.simphony.batch.ssh.MatchedFiles

  • public class MatchedFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of files that match some specified file pattern.
    Author:
    Nick Collier
    See Also:
    OutputFinder
